languages.text:
{n}"Передайте Предвестникам — мы перехватили конвой губернаторских шавок, отправленный встретить {mf|этого|эту} фон Валанциус. Ушел только один из конвоя, но жить ему осталось недолго. До норы губернатора ни сбежавший сопляк, ни те, кого он должен встретить, не доберутся. Наши братья добыли {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-станцию{/g} стражи, а это дурачье и не в курсе, что мы слышим все их переговоры! Знаем все их передвижения и приготовим хорошую встречу. Заря должна знать — мы сделаем все, чтобы остановить ее врагов.
Да настанет Последний восход!"{/n}

traits.locale_text:
{n}"Передайте Предвестникам — мы перехватили конвой губернаторских шавок, отправленный встретить {mf|этого|эту} фон Валанциус. Ушел только один из конвоя, но жить ему осталось недолго. До норы губернатора ни сбежавший сопляк, ни те, кого он должен встретить, не доберутся. Наши братья добыли {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-станцию{/g} стражи, а это дурачье и не в курсе, что мы слышим всех их переговоры! Знаем все их передвижения и приготовим хорошую встречу. Заря должна знать — мы сделаем все, чтобы остановить ее врагов.
Да настанет Последний Восход!"{/n}

languages.text:
{n}"Tell the Harbingers we've intercepted a convoy of the governor's underlings who were supposed to meet that von Valancius {mf|bloke|lass}. Only one out of the whole convoy got away, but he's not long for this world. No one's making it to the governor's hole — not that youngster or the ones he's supposed to meet. Our comrades have got their hands on a guard's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g}, and these fools have no clue we can hear all their comms! We know their every movement and we're going to throw them a fine welcome party. Aurora must have no doubts that we'll do whatever it takes to stop her enemies.
Let the Final Dawn come!"{/n}
languages.original_text:
{n}"Передайте Предвестникам — мы перехватили конвой губернаторских шавок, отправленный встретить {mf|этого|эту} фон Валанциус. Ушел только один из конвоя, но жить ему осталось недолго. До норы губернатора ни сбежавший сопляк, ни те, кого он должен встретить, не доберутся. Наши братья добыли {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-станцию{/g} стражи, а это дурачье и не в курсе, что мы слышим все их переговоры! Знаем все их передвижения и приготовим хорошую встречу. Заря должна знать — мы сделаем все, чтобы остановить ее врагов.
Да настанет Последний восход!"{/n}

traits.locale_text:
{n}"Tell the Harbingers we've intercepted a convoy of the governor's underlings who were supposed to meet that von Valancius {mf|bloke|woman}. Only one of them got away, out of the whole convoy, but he's not long for this world. Neither that youngster nor those he's supposed to meet are going to make it to the governor's lair. Our comrades have got their hands on a {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-station{/g} used by the guards, and these knuckleheads have no clue we can hear all their comms! We know their every movement and we're going to throw them a jolly good welcome party. Let Aurora know we'll do all that needs to be done to stop her enemies.
Let the Final Dawn come!"{/n}

languages.text:
{n}"Sagt den Boten, wir haben einen Konvoi der Untergebenen des Gouverneurs abgefangen, die sich mit {mf|diesem|dieser} von Valancius treffen sollten. Nur ein einziges Mitglied des Konvois ist entkommen, aber er wird auch nicht mehr lang leben. Niemand schafft es zum Loch des Gouverneurs — weder dieser Jungspund noch die, mit denen er sich treffen soll. Unsere Kameraden haben den {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Transmitter{/g} einer Wache in ihren Besitz gebracht, und diese Vollidioten haben keine Ahnung, dass wir ständig mithören! Wir verfolgen jeden ihrer Schritte und werden ihnen einen hübschen Empfang bereiten. Aurora muss wissen, dass wir alles tun, was nötig ist, um ihre Feinde aufzuhalten.
Lasset die Letzte Dämmerung kommen!"{/n}
languages.original_text:
{n}"Tell the Harbingers we've intercepted a convoy of the governor's underlings who were supposed to meet that von Valancius {mf|bloke|lass}. Only one out of the whole convoy got away, but he's not long for this world. No one's making it to the governor's hole — not that youngster or the ones he's supposed to meet. Our comrades have got their hands on a guard's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g}, and these fools have no clue we can hear all their comms! We know their every movement and we're going to throw them a fine welcome party. Aurora must have no doubts that we'll do whatever it takes to stop her enemies.
Let the Final Dawn come!"{/n}

traits.locale_text:
{n}"Sagt den Boten, wir haben einen Konvoi der Untergebenen des Gouverneurs abgefangen, die sich mit {mf|diesem|dieser} von Valancius treffen sollten. Nur ein einziges Mitglied des Konvois ist entkommen, aber er wird auch nicht mehr lang leben. Weder dieser Jungspund noch die Leute, die er treffen soll, werden das Versteck des Gouverneurs erreichen. Unsere Kameraden haben den {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Transmitter{/g} einer Wache in ihren Besitz gebracht, und diese Vollidioten haben keine Ahnung, dass wir ständig mithören! Wir verfolgen jeden ihrer Schritte und werden ihnen einen hübschen Empfang bereiten. Aurora muss wissen, dass wir alles tun, was nötig ist, um ihre Feinde aufzuhalten.
Lasset die Letzte Dämmerung kommen!{/n}

languages.text:
{n}« Dites aux hérauts que nous avons intercepté un convoi de subordonnés du gouverneur qui devaient rencontrer {mf|ce|cette} von Valancius. Sur l'ensemble du convoi, un seul homme s'est échappé, mais il ne sera plus de ce monde bien longtemps. Personne n'atteindra le repaire du gouverneur, ni ce jeunot ni ceux qu'il est censé rencontrer. Nos camarades ont mis la main sur un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}émetteur vox{/g} des gardes, et ces crétins ne se doutent pas que nous pouvons entendre toutes leurs communications ! Nous connaissons leurs moindres déplacements et nous allons les accueillir comme il se doit. Aurore ne doit pas douter de notre détermination à tout faire pour arrêter ses ennemis.
Qu'advienne l'Aube finale ! »{/n}
languages.original_text:
{n}"Tell the Harbingers we've intercepted a convoy of the governor's underlings who were supposed to meet that von Valancius {mf|bloke|lass}. Only one out of the whole convoy got away, but he's not long for this world. No one's making it to the governor's hole — not that youngster or the ones he's supposed to meet. Our comrades have got their hands on a guard's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g}, and these fools have no clue we can hear all their comms! We know their every movement and we're going to throw them a fine welcome party. Aurora must have no doubts that we'll do whatever it takes to stop her enemies.

traits.locale_text:
{n}« Dites aux hérauts que nous avons intercepté un convoi de subordonnés du gouverneur qui devaient rencontrer {mf|ce|cette} von Valancius. Sur l'ensemble du convoi, un seul homme s'est échappé, mais il ne sera plus de ce monde bien longtemps. Ni ce jeune homme ni ceux qu'il doit rencontrer ne parviendront au repaire du gouverneur. Nos camarades ont mis la main sur un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}émetteur-vox{/g} des gardes, et ces crétins ne se doutent pas que nous pouvons entendre toutes leurs communications ! Nous connaissons leurs moindres déplacements et nous allons les accueillir comme il se doit. Aurore ne doit pas douter de notre détermination à tout faire pour arrêter ses ennemis.
Qu'advienne l'Aube finale ! »{/n}

languages.text:
{n}“告诉先驱，我们拦截下来一支总督手下组成的护卫队，他们本打算去见那个冯·瓦兰修斯家族的家伙。整支护卫队只有一个人逃掉了，但他活不了多久。无论是那个年轻人，还是他要见的那群人，都别想活着到达总督的地洞里。我们的同胞拿到了其中一个卫兵的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯器{/g}，那群蠢货根本不知道，他们所有的通信我们都了如指掌！我们清楚他们的一举一动，过一阵子，我们准备为他们举办一场盛大的欢迎派对。‘极光’无须抱有疑虑，我们会不惜一切代价阻止她的敌人。
让终末黎明降临吧！”{/n}
languages.original_text:
{n}"Tell the Harbingers we've intercepted a convoy of the governor's underlings who were supposed to meet that von Valancius {mf|bloke|lass}. Only one out of the whole convoy got away, but he's not long for this world. No one's making it to the governor's hole — not that youngster or the ones he's supposed to meet. Our comrades have got their hands on a guard's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g}, and these fools have no clue we can hear all their comms! We know their every movement and we're going to throw them a fine welcome party. Aurora must have no doubts that we'll do whatever it takes to stop her enemies.
Let the Final Dawn come!"{/n}

traits.locale_text:
{n}“告诉先驱，我们拦截下来一支总督手下组成的护送队，他们本打算去件那个冯·瓦兰修斯家族的家伙。整支护送队只有一个人逃掉了，但他活不了多久。无论是那个年轻人，还是他要见的那群人，都别想到达总督的巢穴。我们的同胞拿到了其中一个卫兵的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}通讯器{/g}，那群笨蛋根本不知道，他们所有的通信我们都了如指掌！我们清楚他们的一举一动，过一阵子，我们准备为他们举办一场盛大的欢迎派对。‘极光’无须抱有疑虑，我们会不惜一切代价阻止她的敌人。
让终末黎明降临吧！”{/n}

languages.text:
{n}「先触れに、我々はフォン・ヴァランシウスに会うはずだった総督の部下たちの護送団を妨害したと伝えてくれ。護送団のうち逃げおおせたのは一人だけだったが、彼はもう長くない。その若者も、彼が会うはずだった者たちも、総督の隠れ家にはたどり着けないだろう。我々の仲間は警備兵の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}を手に入れた。この愚か者どもは我々が彼らの通信をすべて聞いていることを知らない！我々は彼らのすべての動きを知っており、素敵な歓迎パーティーを開くつもりだ。オーロラは、我々が彼女の敵を阻止するために必要なことは何でもすると信じて疑わないに違いない。
さあ、最後の夜明けを迎えよう！」{/n}
languages.original_text:
{n}"Tell the Harbingers we've intercepted a convoy of the governor's underlings who were supposed to meet that von Valancius {mf|bloke|lass}. Only one out of the whole convoy got away, but he's not long for this world. No one's making it to the governor's hole — not that youngster or the ones he's supposed to meet. Our comrades have got their hands on a guard's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g}, and these fools have no clue we can hear all their comms! We know their every movement and we're going to throw them a fine welcome party. Aurora must have no doubts that we'll do whatever it takes to stop her enemies.
Let the Final Dawn come!"{/n}

traits.locale_text:
{n}「先触れに、我々はフォン・ヴァランシウスに会うはずだった総督の部下たちの護送団を妨害したと伝えてくれ。護送団のうち逃げおおせたのは一人だけだったが、彼はもう長くない。その若者も、彼が会うはずだった者たちも、総督の隠れ家にはたどり着けないだろう。我々の仲間は警備兵の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス通信機{/g}を手に入れた。この愚か者どもは我々が彼らの通信をすべて聞いていることを知らない！我々は彼らのすべての動きを知っており、素敵な歓迎パーティーを開くつもりだ。オーロラは、我々が彼女の敵を阻止するために必要なことは何でもすると信じて疑わないに違いない。
さあ、最後の夜明けを迎えよう！{/n}

languages.text:
{n}«Informa a los Heraldos de que hemos interceptado un convoy de los subordinados del gobernador que debían reunirse con von Valancius. Solo uno del convoy escapó, pero no le queda mucho en este mundo. No llegarán al escondite del gobernador. Ni el joven ni el grupo al que iba a buscar. Nuestros camaradas se han apoderado de un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco amplificador{/g} de la guardia, ¡y estos palurdos no tienen ni idea de que podemos oír todas sus comunicaciones! Conocemos todos sus movimientos y vamos a darles una cálida bienvenida. Aurora no debe dudar de que haremos lo que haga falta para detener a sus enemigos.
¡Por el Amanecer Final!»{/n}.
languages.original_text:
{n}"Tell the Harbingers we've intercepted a convoy of the governor's underlings who were supposed to meet that von Valancius {mf|bloke|lass}. Only one out of the whole convoy got away, but he's not long for this world. No one's making it to the governor's hole — not that youngster or the ones he's supposed to meet. Our comrades have got their hands on a guard's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g}, and these fools have no clue we can hear all their comms! We know their every movement and we're going to throw them a fine welcome party. Aurora must have no doubts that we'll do whatever it takes to stop her enemies.
Let the Final Dawn come!"{/n}

traits.locale_text:
{n}«Informa a los Heraldos de que hemos interceptado un convoy de los subordinados del gobernador que debían reunirse con von Valancius. Solo uno del convoy escapó, pero no le queda mucho en este mundo. Ni ese joven, ni aquellos con los que debe reunirse van a llegar a la guarida del gobernador. Nuestros camaradas se han apoderado de un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco amplificador{/g} de la guardia, ¡y estos cabezas huecas no tienen ni idea de que podemos oír todas sus comunicaciones! Conocemos todos sus movimientos y vamos a darles una buena bienvenida. Aurora no debe dudar de que haremos lo que haga falta para detener a sus enemigos.
¡Por el Amanecer Final!»{/n}.

languages.text:
{n}"Müjdecilere haber edin, valinin von Valancius denen {mf|herifle|karıyla} buluşmaya yolladığı konvoyunun yolunu kestik. İçlerinden sadece biri kaçabildi ancak fazla yaşamaz. Kimse valinin saklandığı deliğe ulaşamayacak. Ne o genç ne de görüşmeye niyetlendiği şahıslar. Yoldaşlarımız, bir muhafızın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksyayarını{/g} ele geçirdi. Gerzekler tüm konuşmalarını dinlediğimizden bihaber! Her hareketlerini biliyoruz ve onlara güzel bir karşılama tertipleyeceğiz. Aurora, düşmanlarını durdurmak için gereken neyse yapacağımızdan şüphe duymasın.
Nihai Şafak gelsin!"{/n}
languages.original_text:
{n}"Tell the Harbingers we've intercepted a convoy of the governor's underlings who were supposed to meet that von Valancius {mf|bloke|lass}. Only one out of the whole convoy got away, but he's not long for this world. No one's making it to the governor's hole — not that youngster or the ones he's supposed to meet. Our comrades have got their hands on a guard's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-caster{/g}, and these fools have no clue we can hear all their comms! We know their every movement and we're going to throw them a fine welcome party. Aurora must have no doubts that we'll do whatever it takes to stop her enemies.
Let the Final Dawn come!"{/n}

Kimse valinin saklandığı deliğe ulaşamayacak. Ne o genç ne de görüşmeye niyetlendiği şahıslar. Yoldaşlarımız, bir muhafızın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksyayar{/g}ını ele geçirdi.
